name: Devilish Kisses
description:
A game inspired by this and this videos from Li Speaks, and a little ode to those countless hours I spent playing on girlsgogames. 

Made for Strawberry Jam 7 (Albeit extremely vanilla).

How to play.

Just left-click anywhere on the screen to make the girls kiss. You have to avoid getting caught by the nosy bigoted demons in the back lol.

Music.
  • Happy Footsteps by  Purple Planet Music
  • Sugar cookie by 샛별
  • Funny cat by Sunha Lee
